Name: Cyber Attack
About the game: Be prepared to hack the ship AI and return yourself and your team back to the ship. This is the game where players can be at the same time inside and outside of the board game and have different gameplay, but it still will affect the gameplay for the entire team. Hack robots on the board (space ship rooms) and collect enough data to perform the Cyber Attack, but be cautious because the main computer (M.A.Z.E.) can hack you back and you will need to grab the gun to protect yourself. Robots that can explode and 3D puzzles will create tight situations, so be ready for it.
